function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sustained exposure to negative COVID-19 news causing stress and desensitisation","Impact":"Suboptimal adherence to public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Psychological support, balanced news reporting, stress management techniques","Technologies":"Mental health apps, AI-based news curation","People":"General public, individuals consuming media","Owner":"Media companies, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of COVID-19 news","Impact":"Reduced awareness and understanding of public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Engaging and informative communication strategies, targeted messaging","Technologies":"Social media analytics, personalized content delivery","People":"General public, individuals consuming media","Owner":"Health authorities, media companies, communication experts"}]}
